Name: Ragunna Sales Blitz V
Description: Hmm? Alannah isn't in town today?
QuestDesc: Hmm? Alannah isn't in town today?

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thought I was a goner...

Options.PlotLineKey: How did you get surrounded by TDs?

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, as a member of the Pioneer Association, I should be out in the field doing actual research.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So I came all the way out here for some inspiration. But I didn't expect this...

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, there's a TD right next to that person over there. He might be in trouble. We need to help him!

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: S-Stay back!

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look out! There's a TD right next to you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazy Teen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh? You mean Slowly? Slowly won't hurt anyone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You gave a TD a name?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazy Teen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right. Slowly, it strolls. Slowly, it lives.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazy Teen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm here, just watching Slowly, chilling. Slowly's here, chilling, watching the scenery. We both take each other slowly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Y-You sure?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazy Teen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why don't you join us and enjoy some sunshine?

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's kind of scary...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
By the young man's invitation, the three of you begin sunbathing with Slowy.
After getting plenty of sunshine, you see Alannah in deep thought. She then says goodbye and returns to Jinzhou on her own.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazy Teen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you think? Felt good, didn't it?

Options.PlotLineKey: It doesn't mean us any harm.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lazy Teen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quite nice living life this way, don't you think? Slowly, we stroll. Slowly, we live.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I did! The way that guy treated the TD made me think about the relationship between humans, TDs, and Echoes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In Jinzhou, people fear and despise Tacet Discords because they have decimated countless homelands in the past.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for Echoes, they're mostly for utility purposes. Resonators defeat TDs and transform them into Echoes to enhance their capabilities.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But in Ragunna, Echoes aren't just tools of warfare.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Children buy Echo toys, and you see Echo marching bands in the streets. There are even octopus Echoes that strike the bells in bell towers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then it dawns on me that since the Ragunnesi love Echoes so much, making plushies of Jinzhou Echoes would definitely work!

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They'll sell like hotcakes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After some hard work, Alannah manages to send a shipment of Jinzhou-styled Echo plushies to Ragunna.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ohhh, I have a good feeling about this one! I can't wait for the results!

Dialogues.Speaker: Survey Feedback
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "What a cute Gulpuff stuffed toy!" "Why are they so spiky?" "I'd say our plushie Echoes are a lot cuter."...

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... The reviews are kinda mixed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are all kinds of Echoes over in Ragunna, so it's understandable they can get pretty picky about them.

Options.PlotLineKey: It went better than it could've been.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yep! Can't expect any product design to be a banger right out of the bat. We need to come up with even more and better ideas to attract the Ragunnesi's attention.

Dialogues.Speaker: Alannah
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll message you when something hits me again! Thanks for dropping by today, {PlayerName}!
